login.exploreWithoutAccount: Kliknite ovde da bi ste pogledali bez naloga!
login.checkSpam: Ako budete imali problema, proverite spam folder!
login.mfaTokenEnter: Upiši svoj token iz aplikacije za Autentikaciju

editor.directMessageWarning: Administratori od tvog servera i servera gde se nalaze drugi korisnici u konverzaciji mogu da vide ove poruke.
editor.unlistedWarning: Ovaj woot je podešen kao neizlistan. Neće se pojaviti u pretrazi, hešteg-ovima i drugim funkcijama pronalazka. Ovo nije preporučeno za bilo šta što želiš da bude daleko pronađeno.
editor.directMessageWithQuoteWarning: I citirani korisnik će biti notificiran o ovoj objavi kao pominjanje
editor.sensitivePlaceholder: Šta je osetljivo oko ovog woot-a?
editor.wootQuoteBoxLabel: Nalepite URL woot-a da bi ga citirali. Može da bude spoljni URL ili WAFRN URL
editor.mediaCountMastodonWarning: PAŽNjA! DALjI OTPREMLjENI MEDIJI NEĆE BITI PRIKAZANI NA MASTODONU
editor.altTextWarning: Molimo vas da popunite opise medija. Ako želite da onemogućite ovu proveru, to možete učiniti u podešavanjima.
editor.editorGuide: Doubts on how to format the text or how to start? Check the guide

mfa.scanInstructions: Scan the code below in your Authenticator application, and enter the code shown
mfa.installInstructions: If you don't have an Authenticator app yet we suggest Aegis (Android) or 2FAS (iOS/Android)
mfa.secretFallback: If you cannot read the QR code you can use code '{{ secret }}' manually in your app
mfa.confirmDeleteMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this MFA provider? Note: deleting all MFA providers will disable MFA on your account
mfa.verifySuccess: Success, your MFA is now enabled
mfa.verifyFailed: Verification failed. Check your token, or if the problem persists ask an Administrator
mfa.errorMessageGeneric: There was an issue with your request. Try again, or ask an Administrator for help
mfa.noMfa: You do not have MFA enabled on your account
mfa.mfaList: You have the following MFA providers set up
